text: Louis de Funès (born Louis Germain David de Funès de Galarza; 31 July 1914 – 27 January 1983) was a popular French actor and comedian. He is known for working with Bourvil and Fernandel. He was also a movie director. He appeared in over 200 movies since his career began in 1945. He died from a massive stroke in Nantes, Loire-Atlantique, France, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1914 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French comedians Category:French movie actors Category:French movie directors Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:People from Courbevoie
title: Louis de Funès
